body:
There are cases where workflow / activity is scheduled on wrong task queue and there is no worker listening on those task queue.
It is not easy for worker to detect this issue because sdk worker had no idea they are listening on wrong queues.

We can add metrics from matching service to detect this issue.
The basic idea is, before adding tasks to matching task queue manager, emit metric if there is NO recent pollers (for example in last couple of minutes).
title: Add metrics to detect no poller issue
